Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6655 affecting package gtk2 for versions less than 2.24.32-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6655 affecting package gtk2 for versions less than 2.24.32-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gtk2 is earlier than 2.24.32-12, affected by CVE-2024-6655
